content: काकुः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Change of the voice under different emotions, such as fear, grief, anger; भिन्नकंठध्वनिर्धीरैः काकुरित्यभिधीयते <ls>S. D.</ls>; अलीककाकुकरणकुशलतां <ls>K. 222.</ls> (Hence) {@--2@} A word of negation used in such a manner that it implies the contrary (affirmative), as in questions of appeal, (in such cases the intended meaning is suggested by a change of the voice), <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Pt. 1. 146.</ls> {@--3@} Muttering, murmuring. {@--4@} Tongue. {@--5@} Stress, emphasis.
